name: The Scorpion Insurgency
declaringWar: Our goal is to conquer the world and destroy those who DARE get in our way. And you are one of them. So prepare yourself, prepare yourself for your end!
attacked: You fool, do you really think you can defeat us? Fine then, I will make sure that we'll show no mercy to you!
defeated: You may have won this war. But soon, the Scorpions Insurgency will rise again, and you will soon fall.
introduction: Hold it right there. I am Trevor William, I lead the Scorpion Insurgency. Listen, I have an advice for you. Stay out of our way, and you will be spared.
tradeRequest: I am not always this generous, so accept it before I change my mind.
uniques: When conquering an encampment, earn [25] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit <with [50]% chance>
